subject: Executioners on the Bakumatsu
msgSnippet: I would like to know how can I find info about a ronin by the name KawaKami GenSan , that fought for the Meiji during the Bakumatsu. He was a superb swordsman

I would like to know how can I find info about a ronin by the name 
KawaKami GenSan , that fought for the Meiji during the Bakumatsu.

He was a superb swordsman of the Shiranui Ryu school and seems to 
have been killed after the restoration by his former allies (he 
wasn't satisfied with the Meiji politics).

Any information about he or his school, or means to get it, will be 
greatly welcome.

     Kallikrates
